combi_1.description: Adapting primary weapon frames with secondary firing units and synchronized ammunition-feed routing. This expansion allows for the assembly of multi-purpose combi-weapons and dual-linked systems.

flame_1.description: The safe handling of volatile Promethium fuel requires pressurized fuel-lines and triple-redundant chemical igniters. This expansion enables the manufacturing of flame-based weaponry and pressurized fuel canisters.

force_1.description: Force weapons and gear necessitate the inclusion of rare psycho-conductive materials and warp-attuned crystalline circuits within the blade or haft to channel psychic energy. This allows the forge to produce specialized armaments for the Librarium.

grav_1.description: Graviton technology relies on the manipulation of local gravity fields to crush targets under their own mass. This expansion allows for the production of complex weaponized gravitic induction systems.

heavy_1.description: The construction of heavy armaments requires specialized power-interface linkages and reinforced alloys to handle high-thermal output and significant kinetic recoil. This expansion allows for the production of man-portable heavy armaments.

laser_1.description: The production of laser-based weaponry requires the casting of flawless focusing crystals and the installation of high-capacity thermal dissipation vanes. This enables the manufacture of concentrated beam weaponry.

melta_1.description: Assembly of heat-shielded combustion chambers and concentrated microwave emitters for molecular thermal induction. Necessary for producing anti-armor melta weaponry.

plasma_1.description: Forging high-strength magnetic containment coils and hydrogen-fuel canisters to safely harness superheated matter. This expansion allows for the production of plasma-based weapons and their critical safety-venting systems.

power_1.description: Integrating miniaturized disruption-field generators that project matter-disrupting energy around a strike surface enables the production of power-field-enhanced melee weaponry and defensive shielding.

solid_projectile_1.description: Manufacturing rapid-fire kinetic weaponry focuses on high-tensile alloys for barrels and the assembly of complex gas-operated cycling mechanisms.

vehicle_armaments_1.description: Adapting infantry-grade armaments for hull-mounting necessitates the manufacture of reinforced recoil-dampening cradles and high-capacity automated ammunition feeds. Enables the assembly of pintle, sponson, and turret-mounted weapon systems for the Chapter's vehicle pool.
